title: Affidavit as evidence
context: [ยง667-64] Affidavit as evidence. If it appears by the affidavit filed under section 667-62&copy; that the affiant has in all respects complied with the requirements of the power of sale and section 667-62 in relation to all things to be done by the affiant before selling the time share interest, a certified copy of the record thereof shall be admitted as evidence that the power of sale was duly executed.
